arts.ttl: Exeter City 1 Northampton Town 1 - Grecians scramble late equaliser in relegation battle - Devon Live
arts.sum: Cox in stoppage-time had a chance to win it, but he couldn’t get a shot away, as it finished all square, as City kept their run of not losing against bottom half sides since August alive. But three minutes from time they got one they barely deserved, with Sonny Cox lashes home from close range to make it 1-1.

arts.ttl: Exeter deny Northampton as Sonny Cox strikes late
arts.sum: Dara Costelloe had put the visitors ahead at St James Park.

arts.ttl: Exeter City back from Spain and ready for final third of the season
arts.sum: Exeter City will hope that the benefits of the warm weather camp in Spain in preparation for the match against Northampton Town this weekend pay off. Burton Albion’s stoppage-time winner at Lincoln City last Saturday means the now 18 th placed Grecians are just three above the drop zone, and with a worse goal difference, although they have two games in hand on the Brewers and at least one on everyone below them.

arts.ttl: Exeter City confident benefits of trip to Spain will be evident
arts.sum: Speaking of what the group have been up to since their arrival, assistant manager Kevin Nicholson said: “We got together and had a meal and a bit of a social on the first night, which took a bit to get going after how poor things were (in losing 3-0 at Charlton Athletic) on Saturday, but life goes on, we have to move on and we can’t dwell on that. “Then we had a recovery day where lads did different things, there was a bit of golf, some paddle and active recovery stuff and in the evening, we got together and had a bit of time and then the real work started on Tuesday.

arts.ttl: Kevin McDonald on his second Exeter City spell, what has changed, and coaching ambitions
arts.sum: Veteran midfielder Kevin McDonald has witnessed first-hand the evolution of Exeter City across two spells with the club. He added: “My second spell at the club has probably been quite similar in many ways,” McDonald said.

arts.ttl: Exeter City hope to prove doubters wrong over their trip to Spain
arts.sum: KEVIN NICHOLSON accepts there will be some doubters over Exeter City’s controversial four-day training trip to Spain, but hopes a home win over Northampton Town on Saturday will silence those critics, writes Stuart James. We want to win games, we want to get into the play-offs and achieve something that has never been achieved at Exeter City and the group itself, going into pre-season, were all the same.

arts.ttl: Preview: Exeter City vs. Northampton Town - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's League One clash between Exeter City and Northampton Town, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
